thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 7 of 122
thread.title: Lesley Joyce

author: Lesley Joyce
title: Lesley Joyce
text: I have been absolutely delighted with the service provided by Dexter Tahsin at DialAFlight who was incredibly helpful and professional when making arrangements for my trip from Scotland to Colorado in Dec. So much so that I've already booked a further trip to New York in March. For both trips Dexter has been very impressive making the whole process so much easier than going thru endless screens to book online, also much more enjoyable and worry-free that everything was dealt with properly. Dexter at DialAFlight will definitely be my first port of call for future trips too and I have already recommended Dexter and DialAFlight to family and friends. Fantastic service indeed, for which thank you!
